ResourceHeader.Description: Variometers: Triaxial high-sensitivity fluxgate magnetometer (X,Y and Z components) and Overhauser magnetometer (scalar field F) after Jun. 1996. Triaxial fluxgate magnetometer (X,Y and Z)(1984 - 1996). Torsion magnetometers (H,D and Z) before 1984. Absolute Instruments: Magnetometer theodolite (D and I) and proton precession magnetometer (F).
